post.author: KC Clark
post.body: Ok, so I've tried MNeMIC's texture creation method step by step and that didn't work. And the NVidia link mentioned in the texture tutorial from this forum doesn't work anymore. The names of my textures show up in the editor's texture list but no pics. By that I mean the editor won't load up the textures. So...what's my problem?

post.author: LDAsh
post.body: Double-check the paths of your material (.MTR) files so that they point in the right direction with the correct syntax. Reference other MTR scripts to make sure. Post it here if you're still stumped so we can takes a look at it.
